content:
[Baseline emissions]

The baseline emissions are the baseline emission reductions factor times the net electricity supplied to the grid. Therefore,

BE,= EF, x EG,

EF,: GHG emission factor of the NEPG, calculated ex ante in the registered CDM-PDD and VCS-PD as 1.1459 tCO2e/MWh

EG,: Net electricity supplied to the grid

The net electricity supplied by the Project (EG,) can be calculated as:

EG, = Eexport - Eimport

‚Äù!

3]

The verification team has cross-checked the values from the MRRs with the sales receipts for the period from 02/12/2008-27/07/2010. The conservative values are used for emission reductions calculation. The verified values are shown in the following Table 3.
